column3: Go to admin journal search page at /admin/journals
Locate a record with the metadata value 'Last Owner Transfer: Never' and click 'Edit this journal'
Locate the "Re-assign publisher account" section of the form
Change the user to a different user account
close the journal form and go back to the admin search page
Refresh the search and locate the journal you just edited

column4: The "Last Owner Transfer" field displays the current date and time

column3: Click "Edit this journal" and go to the admin form

column4: There is a note attached to the record indicating the previous and new owner and the date and time of the transfer
